class.fighter.name: Fighter
class.fighter.description.short: A martial class with a broad range of expertise and ability. Can specialize into nearly any class of weapon, but has no magical ability.
class.fighter.description.long: The fighter embodies the spirit of martial mastery. Fighters represent the pinnacle of physical prowess and ability, with skills focused on their preffered style of combat and weapon specialisation.
class.fighter.loadout.peasant.name: Peasant
class.fighter.loadout.ranger.name: Ranger
class.fighter.loadout.skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
class.fighter.loadout.knight.name: Knight
class.fighter.loadout.warrior.name: Warrior
class.fighter.skills.group.warrior.name: Warrior
class.fighter.skills.group.warrior.descr: Warrior skills focus on smackin' guys with a big stick.
class.fighter.skills.group.skirmisher.de: Skirmisher skills are focused on one-handed weapons, dual-wielding and fast fighting in general.
class.fighter.skills.group.knight.name: Knight
class.fighter.skills.group.knight.descri: Knight skills focus are focused on shields, heavy armor and deliberate, paced combat.
class.fighter.skill.armor_light_foot.des:
Increase the stats gained from [key.item_tag.light] [key.item_tag.armor] by [key.variable.positive]({2:0.#%}).
Each piece of [key.item_tag.light] [key.item_tag.armor] you're wearing grants you [key.variable.positive]({0:P1}) [key.stat.movement.speed], lowers your [key.stat.stamina.delay] by [key.variable.positive]({1}) and grants [key.variable.positive]({2}) [key.stat.stamina.regen].
class.fighter.skill.fleet.name: Fleet
class.fighter.skill.fleet.description:
Reduce the [key.stat.movement.speed] [key.flavour.negative](penalty) you receive while [key.mechanic.strafing] or [key.mechanic.backpedaling] by [key.variable.positive]({0:P0})
Increase your [key.stat.generic.item_swap_speed] by [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}).
class.fighter.skill.riposte.name: Riposte
class.fighter.skill.riposte.description: [key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]If performed with a [key.hold_type.one_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon ([key.item_tag.shield](Shields) excluded), your next [key.variable.positive]({0:N1}) [key.flag.melee] attack(s) (rounded [key.flavour.negative](down)) within [key.variable.positive]({1}) seconds gain [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}) [key.stat.attack.speed].
class.fighter.skill.opportunist.name: Opportunist
class.fighter.skill.opportunist.descript: [key.trigger.on_stun][key.style.break_small]Restore [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.stamina], gain [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}) [key.stat.generic.item_swap_speed] and [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}) [key.stat.attack.speed] on your [key.flavour.important](first) [key.flag.melee] attack in the next [key.variable.positive]({3}) second(s).
class.fighter.skill.cleave.name: Cleave
class.fighter.skill.cleave.description:
While wielding a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon, deal an extra [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) [key.mechanic.damage] for each enemy hit [key.flavour.important](beyond the first) during an attack.
[key.mechanic.stacks] up to [key.variable.static]({1}) times.
class.fighter.skill.sadist.name: Sadist
class.fighter.skill.sadist.description: [key.trigger.on_execute][key.style.break_small]If performed with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon, gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.grit] and restore [key.variable.positive]({1:N1}) [key.stat.stamina] per second for [key.variable.positive]({2}) seconds.
class.fighter.skill.weight_training.name: Weight Training
class.fighter.skill.weight_training.desc:
The [key.stat.movement.speed] [key.flavour.negative](penalty) you receive during attacks with [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapons is reduced by [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) and your [key.mechanic.turncap] is increased by [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}).
In addition, the [key.mechanic.heft] of your [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapons is [key.flavour.positive](reduced) by [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}).
class.fighter.skill.sword_retort.name: Duelist
class.fighter.skill.sword_retort.descrip:
Your [key.mechanic.parry_window] window with [key.hold_type.one_handed] [key.item_tag.sword](Swords) and [key.item_tag.dagger](Daggers) increases by [key.variable.positive]({0:0.##} seconds) and your [key.mechanic.parry](Parries) with them restore [key.variable.positive]({1}) [key.stat.stamina](Stamina.)
However, your [key.mechanic.block_guard] with [key.item_tag.sword](Swords) and [key.item_tag.dagger](Daggers) is [key.flavour.negative](reduced) by [key.variable.negative]({2:N0}).
class.fighter.skill.cruel_blows.name: Cruel Blows
class.fighter.skill.cruel_blows.descript:
When attacking with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon any excess [key.mechanic.posture_damage_enemy] dealt when [key.mechanic.posture_break_enemy](Posture Breaking) an enemy is converted into [key.mechanic.damage] at a ratio of [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}).
Additionally, deal [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}) more [key.mechanic.posture_damage_enemy] with [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapons.
class.fighter.skill.push_forwards.name: Push Forwards
class.fighter.skill.push_forwards.descri:
[key.trigger.on_damaged][key.style.break_small]You can restore up to [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) of the [key.stat.health] lost by dealing [key.mechanic.damage] with a [key.flag.melee] weapon for up to [key.variable.positive]({1}) seconds.
[key.mechanic.damage] is converted into [key.stat.health] at a ratio of [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}).
This skill will not work on [key.mechanic.damage_over_time] effects.
class.fighter.skill.lunge.name: Lunge
class.fighter.skill.lunge.description:
[key.trigger.on_activate][key.style.break_small]When wielding a [key.hold_type.two_handed] weapon, you may activate this ability to dash forward and perform a downward strike.
Kills with this ability refresh its cooldown.
class.fighter.skill.blademaster.name: Blademaster
class.fighter.skill.blademaster.descript:
You can [key.mechanic.parry] with your opposite hand during attacks while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] ([key.item_tag.shield](Shields) excluded).
Does not allow [key.mechanic.block](Blocking) during this window.
class.fighter.skill.lightning_reflexes.d:
When you [key.mechanic.parry] a [key.flag.physical] [key.mechanic.projectile] it will be [key.flavour.important](reflected) in the direction you're looking.
[key.flag.enchanted] [key.mechanic.projectile](Projectiles) will count as [key.flag.magic](Magical).
[key.skill.level] [key.variable.positive]({0})[key.style.break_small]You can [key.flavour.important](reflect) [key.flag.magic](Magical) [key.mechanic.projectile](Projectiles) in addition to [key.flag.physical].
class.fighter.skill.sundering_strikes.de:
Your [key.hold_type.one_handed] [key.flag.melee] attacks reduce the targets [key.stat.defense.armor] by [key.variable.positive]({0}) for [key.variable.positive]({1}) second(s).
[key.mechanic.stacks] up to [key.variable.positive]({2}) times.
class.fighter.skill.twin_strike.name: Twin Strike
class.fighter.skill.twin_strike.descript: If you strike a [key.mechanic.stun](Stunned) enemy with both weapons while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] within [key.variable.positive]({0}) second(s) of each other, apply [key.variable.positive]({1}) [key.status.bleed] and restore [key.variable.positive]({2}) [key.stat.stamina].
class.fighter.skill.executor.name: Executor
class.fighter.skill.executor.description:
[key.trigger.on_execute][key.style.break_small]If performed with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.attack.power] for [key.variable.positive]({1}) second(s) and apply [key.variable.positive]({2}) [key.status.bleed].
In addition, you will [key.flavour.positive](instantly kill) [key.mechanic.execute](Executed) targets put below [key.variable.positive]({3:0.#%}) [key.stat.health].
class.fighter.skill.rhythmic_fighting.de:
Each [key.flavour.important](consecutive), [key.flavour.important](successful) [key.flag.melee] attack with [key.flavour.important](alternating) hands while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] grants you [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}) [key.stat.attack.speed] and [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}) [key.mechanic.damage].
Attacks must be within [key.variable.positive]({0}) seconds of each other.
[key.mechanic.stacks] up to [key.variable.positive]({3}) times.
[key.flavour.negative](Attacking out of rhythm will remove all Stacks.)
class.fighter.skill.fang_and_claw.name: Fang and Claw
class.fighter.skill.fang_and_claw.descri:
While [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] with a [key.item_tag.dagger] and another weapon of a different type ([key.item_tag.shield](Shields) excluded):
Gain [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) [key.stat.attack.speed] with the [key.item_tag.dagger] after each attack with the opposite weapon, but at a [key.variable.negative](-{1:P0}) [key.mechanic.Damage] penalty for the [key.item_tag.dagger].
This [key.item_tag.dagger] hit will also inflict [key.variable.positive]({2}) [key.status.bleed].
class.fighter.skill.dual_weapon_fighting:
Reduce the [key.mechanic.damage], [key.stat.attack.speed], and [key.stat.stamina] [key.flavour.negative](penalties) for attacks while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] [key.flag.melee] weapons by [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}).
Additionaly, you gain [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}) [key.stat.movement.speed] while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] [key.flag.melee] weapons.
class.fighter.skill.grit.name: Resolve
class.fighter.skill.grit.description: [key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]Gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.grit] upon your next [key.variable.positive]({1}) successful [key.flag.melee] attack(s) for up to [key.variable.positive]({2}) seconds.
class.fighter.skill.armor_heavy_master.d:
Increase the stats from gained from [key.item_tag.heavy] [key.item_tag.armor] by [key.variable.positive]({1:0.#%}).
While wearing all [key.item_tag.heavy] [key.item_tag.armor]:
If you would reduce the [key.mechanic.damage] you take to [key.variable.positive]({0}) or less after applying your [key.stat.category.defense](Resistances), [key.flavour.important](negate) the [key.mechanic.damage] entirely.
class.fighter.skill.steel_soul.name: Steel of Soul
class.fighter.skill.steel_soul.descripti:
[key.trigger.on_death][key.style.break_small]Instead of [key.mechanic.death](Dying), prevent the [key.mechanic.death](Death,) [key.mechanic.stagger] nearby enemies and gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.grit].
While your [key.stat.grit] is above [key.flavour.important](0) you [key.flavour.positive](cannot die).
If you [key.mechanic.kill] an enemy while in this state, all of your [key.stat.grit] will be converted into [key.stat.health] and you will regain [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}) [key.stat.health.max].
This effect does not prevent further [key.mechanic.damage] while active.
This skill takes its toll on you and requires a [key.mechanic.rest] to recover.
Note: Resting isn't implemented yet. This will only trigger [key.flavour.important](once).
class.fighter.skill.shield_counter.name: Counter Bash
class.fighter.skill.shield_counter.descr: [key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]Your [key.mechanic.block] will become active during your [key.flavour.important](next) [key.flag.melee] attack with a [key.item_tag.shield] within [key.variable.positive]({0}) seconds
class.fighter.skill.shield_confidence.de: [key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]For [key.variable.positive]({0}) seconds, your [key.flavour.important](next) successful [key.mechanic.block] will automatically be upgraded to a [key.mechanic.parry].
class.fighter.skill.shield_mastery.name: Shield Mastery
class.fighter.skill.shield_mastery.descr: Your [key.mechanic.parry](Parries) with [key.item_tag.shield](Shields) deal [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) more [key.mechanic.posture_damage] and can cause [key.mechanic.posture_break_enemy](Posture Breaks).
class.fighter.skill.shield_combo.name: Momentum
class.fighter.skill.shield_combo.descrip:
[key.trigger.on_block][key.style.break_small]After [key.mechanic.block](Blocking) with a [key.item_tag.shield], for [key.variable.positive]({0}) seconds the [key.flavour.important](next) attack with your opposite hand gains [key.variable.positive]({1:0.#%}) [key.stat.attack.speed] and [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}) [key.mechanic.damage].
[key.flavour.reminder](This effect will also trigger when you parry an attack.)
class.fighter.skill.shield_daze.name: Dazing Blow
class.fighter.skill.shield_daze.descript: [key.trigger.on_execute][key.style.break_small]When you perform an [key.mechanic.execute](Execution) with a [key.item_tag.shield], restore [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.stamina] and apply [key.variable.positive]({1:N0}) [key.status.slow].
class.fighter.skill.shield_satisfying_cr: When you perform an [key.mechanic.execute](Execution) with a [key.item_tag.shield], gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.grit] and restore [key.variable.positive]({1}) [key.stat.posture] per second for [key.variable.positive]({2}) second(s).
class.fighter.skill.shield_perfect_defen:
You may still attack with your opposite hand when [key.mechanic.block](Blocking) with a [key.item_tag.shield].
However, you will receive a [key.variable.negative]({0:N0}) [key.mechanic.block_guard] [key.flavour.negative](penalty) on your [key.mechanic.block] if struck while attacking.
class.fighter.skill.shield_steady.name: Steady
class.fighter.skill.shield_steady.descri:
Your [key.item_tag.shield](Shields) gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) more [key.mechanic.block_guard].
[key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]If performed with a [key.item_tag.shield], your [key.mechanic.parry](Parries) will restore [key.variable.positive]({1}) extra [key.stat.stamina] and [key.variable.positive]({2}) [key.stat.posture].
Increase the stats gained from [key.item_tag.medium] [key.item_tag.armor] by [key.variable.positive]({0:0.#%}).
While wearing all [key.item_tag.medium] [key.item_tag.armor]:
[key.variable.positive]({1:0.#%}) of the [key.mechanic.block](Unblocked) [key.mechanic.damage] you take is converted into [key.mechanic.posture_damage] instead at a [key.variable.negative]({2:P0}) ratio.
If you don't have enough [key.stat.posture], or if you're [key.mechanic.posture_break](Posture Broken), [key.mechanic.damage] will be applied as normal.
This [key.mechanic.posture_damage] cannot [key.mechanic.posture_break](Break) your [key.stat.posture].
class.fighter.skill.like_a_bug.name: Like a Bug
class.fighter.skill.like_a_bug.descripti:
If you would [key.mechanic.posture_break_enemy](Break) an enemies [key.stat.posture] in [key.variable.static](one) hit, [key.flavour.positive](kill them).
[key.flavour.negative](Dramatically).
class.fighter.skill.indulgent.name: Indulgent
class.fighter.skill.indulgent.descriptio:
When your [key.stat.grit] decays naturally, it is converted into [key.stat.stamina] and [key.stat.posture] at a [key.variable.positive]({0}) ratio.
[key.trigger.on_kill][key.style.break_small]When you [key.mechanic.kill] an enemy with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon, [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) of your [key.stat.grit] is converted into [key.stat.health].
class.fighter.skill.forceful.name: Break the Spirit
class.fighter.skill.forceful.description:
[key.trigger.on_hit][key.style.break_small]When striking an enemy with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon, restore [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.stamina] and [key.variable.positive]({1}) [key.stat.posture].
[key.trigger.on_guard_break] or[key.style.break_small][key.trigger.on_stagger][key.style.break_small]If performed with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon, restore [key.variable.positive]({2}) [key.stat.stamina] and gain [key.variable.positive]({3:P0}) [key.stat.attack.speed] for [key.variable.positive]({4}) seconds.
class.fighter.skill.flow.name: Flow State
class.fighter.skill.flow.description:
Your [key.mechanic.parry_window] with [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapons is [key.flavour.negative](reduced) by [key.variable.negative]({0} seconds).
[key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]If performed with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon, gain [key.variable.positive]({1:P0}) [key.stat.attack.speed] and [key.variable.positive]({2:P0}) [key.mechanic.damage].
[key.mechanic.stacks] up to [key.variable.positive]({3}) times, [key.mechanic.stacks] last indefinitely.
[key.flavour.negative](All Stacks are lost upon taking damage, blocking an attack instead of parrying it, or swapping weapons.)
class.fighter.skill.vexation.name: Vexation
class.fighter.skill.vexation.description:
Whenever your [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapon attacks are [key.mechanic.block](Blocked) or [key.mechanic.parry](Parried), gain [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.attack.speed] and [key.variable.positive]({1}) [key.stat.attack.power] for [key.variable.positive]({2}) second(s).
[key.mechanic.stacks] up to [key.variable.positive]({3}) times.
